short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a link to the CoderStats page for the currently displayed GitHub user when browsing github.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CoderStats link for GitHub Chrome extension displays a link to the CoderStats page for the currently displayed user or organization profile page on GitHub.
